CustomField.description: If the field "No Match - No Revenue Target" is true, then do not add a revenue target if there is no matching master data lookup in NPN Revenue Commitment Master (for Program Type, Competency, Level, Account Billing Country)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the field "No Match - No Revenue Target" is true, then do not add a revenue target if there is no matching master data lookup in NPN Revenue Commitment Master(for Program Type, Competency, Level, Account Billing Country)
CustomField.label: No Match - No Revenue Target
